text: Lawrence Montaigne (February 26, 1931 - March 17, 2017) was an American actor, writer, dancer, and stuntman. As an actor, he was known for his appearances on many 1960s-era television shows such as Star Trek. He was also known for his role as Haynes in The Great Escape. Montaigne died on March 17, 2017, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Lawrence Montaigne's Personal Website Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn
title: Lawrence Montaigne
